name: Product Analyst (Sales)
description:
Borzo (former Dostavista Global) - one of the biggest and most technologically advanced players in the global same-day delivery market. We deliver unparalleled convenience to businesses and people, all the while creating millions of jobs. More than 1 million couriers are registered on the platform in 10 countries. They deliver millions of parcels per year. In order to keep pace, we are constantly looking for ambitious professionals to join our team. We have a lot of difficult tasks with no chance to be bored.

Mission

The mission of the product analyst in the Sales team is to provide insights into commercial business performance, sales customer journey, sales channel effectiveness, Sales Pipeline analysis, etc. with the goal to support stakeholders’ decision-making with impactful analyses and recommendations. The insights will be SMART (Specific, Measurable, Attainable, Relevant, and Time-Based). The product analyst will also have the mission to act as domain expert for (digital) analytics expertise, working together with the other data analytics disciplines (data collection, data quality & management, data engineering, data visualization) to consistently drive forward the data literacy maturity of the company, with the main focus in sales activities, combining pre and post-sales analytics.

Expected outcomes

  • Design comprehensive reports and build consistent insights based on sales objectives
  • Provide a single point of truth of customer data across the organization, by combining, stitching, and transforming data, to be used to any BI tool
  • Define steering KPIs, for Pre Sales and Post-sales, as well as produce comprehensive reporting to different stakeholders
  • Preparing reports for executive leadership that effectively communicate trends, patterns, and predictions using relevant data.
  • Creating appropriate documentation that allows stakeholders to understand the steps of the data analysis process and duplicate or replicate the analysis if necessary.
  • Provide comprehensive and standardize data collection solutions, in agreement with sales teams

We expect you to have

  • Hands-on experience & knowledge using analytic tools preferably in an eCommerce enterprise environment
  • Knowledge of data manipulation languages such as SQL, Python
  • Familiarity with business and sales terms, such as CAC, LTV, retention, activation, conversion, sales pipeline, sales closing, etc
  • Knowledge of CRM system and sales automation tools e.g. Salesforce, Bitrix CRM, Zapier, etc
  • Good presentation skills and have a clear understanding of translating technical terms to simple language
  • Emotional intelligence, openness to a new, strong ability to listen and hear
  • Creative and able to think unconventionally by apply descriptive and diagnostic analytics principals
  • Good project management skills, capable to prioritize and follow the agile methodology way of working
  • Perfect spoken and written English
  • Good knowledge of digital data collection, tagging/tracking principles and tools, such as Google Tag Manager, and/or Customer Data Platforms

We offer

  • Ability to work remotely (both partially and completely)

  • Equipment for work: laptop, additional monitor, headset, and so on

  • Flexible schedule: we work at a convenient time, the main thing is to be in touch during the main working hours

  • Horizontal structure without strict subordination and bureaucracy

  • Official employment and salary

  • The annual indexation of salaries and the feedback from the head

  • Education: own library, paid courses, and conferences
